# AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy.stream

**Case**

Stream data from disk, decoding in real time.

## Declaration

```swift
case stream
```

## Specifying a loading strategy

- **AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy.preload**: Load and decode all the data into memory before playback.
